title: Screen green tint on my new Pixel 5
content:
Anyone has this this issue?
When I turn down the brightness under 80%, I can see some green "glow" at right top cornor over the screen. My friend's didn't.
Here's some photo: Mine Firend's
Searched on google, seems like Samsung are facing this issue, and solved by software update, but I can't find a single topic about this issue on Pixel 5, yet.
